claimAllRewards().details: Claim all rewards from all the slots

claimRewards(uint256,uint256).details: Claim a specific amount of rewards from accumulated rewards of specific slot

params._rewardAmount: The amount of rewards to be claimed.
params._slotId: The slot id from where rewards should be claimed

getTotalRewards().details: Get the total rewards till now of sender.

returns._0: total accumulated rewards of sender of each slot till now

getUserRewards(uint256).details: Get the total accumulated rewards for sender of specific slot.

params._slotId: the specific slot id of which senders rewards requested

returns._0: The total amount of accumulated rewards.

getUserStake(uint256).details: Get the staked amount and start time for sender of a specific slot.

params._slotId: the slot id of which token amount and start time requested.

getUserStakesInfo().details: Get the array of details of each slot of user

returns._0: Array of detail of each slot i.e. slot id, amount staked, rewards and startTime

getUserTotalStakes().details: Get the total staked amount of sender*

initialize(uint16,uint256,uint256,addres.details: Proxy initializer function sets new owner other than admin

migration(uint256,address).details: Migrate funds to a new contract address.

params.amount: The amount of funds to migrate.
params.newAddress: The address of the new contract to receive the funds.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

restake(uint256).details: Restake a specific amount of rewards.

params.amount: The amount of rewards to restake

restake(uint256,uint256).details: Restake a specific amount of rewards of specific slot and update stake.

params._amount: The amount of rewards to be restaked.
params._slotId: The slod it of which rewards to be restaked.

restakeAll().details: Restake all the accumulated rewards of each slot

setLiquidityPool(address).details: Set the liqudity pool which provides reward NRK tokens

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unstake(uint256).details: Unstake a specific amount of tokens

params.amount: The amount of token user want to unstake

unstake(uint256,uint256).details: Unstake a specific amount of tokens from a specific slot

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be unstaked.
params._slotId: the id of slot from which token should be unstaked

unstakeAll().details: Unstake all the token of user

claimAllRewards().notice: Transfer total rewards of user from accumulated rewards of each slotThis is a nonReentrant function

claimRewards(uint256,uint256).notice: Claimed rewards will be transferred to the user's address.This is a nonReentrant function

migration(uint256,address).notice: This function is non-reentrant and can only be called by the contract owner.

setAPY(uint16).notice: This function can only be called by the contract owner.

setFrequency(uint256).notice: this function can only be called by the contract owner.

setLiquidityPool(address).notice: this function can only be called by the contract owner.

setMinimumStake(uint256).notice: this function can only be called by the contract owner.

stake().notice: Native NRK token more or equal to minimum value should be provided by the user

unstake(uint256).notice: Unstake specific amount of token and transfer unstaked tokens and rewards of those tokens to userthis is a nonReentrant function

unstake(uint256,uint256).notice: Unstaked tokens and rewards will be transferred to the user's addressThis is a nonReentrant function

unstakeAll().notice: Unstaked all tokens and total rewards will be transferred to the user's address.This is a nonReentrant function

updateStakingPause(bool).notice: This function can only be called by the contract owner.
